body_html:
Hi @zheng-xq, I would like to work on this.

I was trying to read the source code to understand how to add GPU ops for tf.unique.
After reading different files like argmax_op.cc and softmax_op.cc, I understood that I need to add Device and functor. Functor will have the logic for the GPU op. Please correct me if I'm wrong.

I read unique_op.cc and understood the current logic which is a multiple-pass algorithm. I wanted to know if the new functor will have the same logic.
Then, I read where_op.cc and found out that there's already a GPU logic for it. So, I think, we don't need any changes in that.

Thanks! :)

body:
Hi @zheng-xq, I would like to work on this.

I was trying to read the source code to understand how to add GPU ops for `tf.unique`. 
After reading different files like `argmax_op.cc` and `softmax_op.cc`, I understood that I need to add `Device` and `functor`. `Functor` will have the logic for the GPU op. Please correct me if I'm wrong.

I read `unique_op.cc` and understood the current logic which is a multiple-pass algorithm. I wanted to know if the new `functor` will have the same logic.
Then, I read `where_op.cc` and  found out that there's already a GPU logic for it. So, I think, we don't need any changes in that.

Thanks! :)
